alertDescription.value: pod service is not ready for more than 5 mins

query.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_pod_status_phase' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend phase = tostring(Json.phase) | where phase == 'Running' and Val > 0 | extend pod = tostring(Json.pod) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | join kind=inner ( InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_pod_status_ready' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend condition = tostring(Json.condition) | where condition == 'false' and Val > 0 | extend pod = tostring(Json.pod) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, Val, pod, namespace, condition) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, pod, namespace | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, Val, pod, namespace, phase, condition
